## Problem 1
Import and cleaning subway dataset 

```{r gather}
subway_data =
  read_csv(file = "./data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names(subway_data) %>% 
  select(subway_data, line:entry, vending, ada) %>% 
  mutate(entry = ifelse("YES", TRUE, FALSE) )
```

```{r}
ifelse(subway_data$entry, yes = "true", no = "false")
```
